item.title: Using VCR to Mock Your Requests
item.author: schwendler@gmail.com (Ana Schwendler)
item.description: In the past months, I’ve been working with a lot of external API requests. Since I’m part of the Marley Spoonâ€™s logistics team, our challenge is to make sure our requests are done in time and everything is delivered in good shape. Part of this task, as a software developer, is making sure the code I write is well tested, and does what it is supposed to do. Our software has many integrations with our logistics partners.
